text: Gregor Florian Gysi (; born 16 January 1948) is a German attorney, former president of the Party of the European Left and a politician of The Left (Die Linke) political party.bbc news, Profile, bbc.co.uk; accessed 16 September 2015. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians of the Left Party Category:Members of the German Bundestag Category:German lawyers Category:Politicians from Berlin Category:Leaders of the Opposition (Germany)
title: Gregor Gysi
